org.jlinalg.demo
Class Xor

java.lang.Object
  org.jlinalg.demo.Xor

public class Xor
extends java.lang.Object

Example showing Exclusive-Or neural net problem using JLinAlg. Example can be easily modified by changing values of inpat, tgpat.

Author:
Simon D. Levy

Nested Class Summary
private  class Xor.SigdervOperator
          operator defining the first derivative of the sigmoid w.r.t.
private  class Xor.SigmoidOperator
          operator defining the sigmoid squashing function
